description:
Learn how to use Python with the open-source Godot game engine -
leverage the power of Python's ecosystem to build procedural content and
learn the basics of Godot.

`Download Talk Resources
Here <https://www.dropbox.com/s/z4p1iogjho4wkq7/Godot%20Python%20Resources.zip?dl=0>`__
title: Building Procedural Games with Python and Godot
